title: A Lovely Girl Turning into a Rat - Novel Updates
tags: Abusive Characters   Depictions of Cruelty   Early Romance   Female Protagonist   Ghosts   Late Romance   Reincarnation   Torture
author: A Candy   一枚糖果
description:
This is a love story shrouded in sadness and horror.

Under the abuse of Tibetan Noble Nima's three women, a lovely girl should turn into a big rat within a month…

After reincarnation into the modern age, they met each other again...>
